msbt.message: This year just flew by! I can't believe it's over already, .You ready for the new year? You fired up? I'm fired up. My fire's ROARIN'! Bring on the new year!
I heard there's gonna be fireworks after the Countdown tonight! Now THAT'S how you ring in a new year! You're gonna be there, right? 'Cause we gotta party our butts off!
I am SO revved up for the new year! We're gonna rock to a close! You ready, ?
I'm always kinda antsy on New Year's Eve. I get really caught up wondering what next year's gonna be like.But then I remember to relax. The new year is gonna rock, and that's all there is to it, !
